· Only in Ninjutsu Variation
· Connect 3 Downfalls during the match [Away][BK]
· Final hit must be Doom Blade [Towards][BP]

· Only in Hellfire Variation
· Scorpion must have Flame Aura active [Down][Away][BK]
· Must be Full Screen distance away from opponent
· Final hit must be from Fire Ball [Down][Away][FP] or Hell Ball [Down][Away][FP][+][R2]

· Only in Inferno Variation
· Scorpion must connect Minion Charge [Down][Away][FP] Minion Drop [Down][Away][BP] and Minion Grab [Down][Away][BK] at least once
· Final hit must be from Minion Grab [Down][Away][BK] or Minion Hold [Down][Away][BK][+][R2]

· Available in all Variations
· Scorpion must have over 50% health remaining
· Final hit must be enhanced Double Spear [Away][Towards][FP][+][R2][,][R2]

· Available in all Variations
· Final hit must be from Air Flameport (Air) [Down][Away][FK][+][R2]

· Only in Hollywood Variation
· Cassie must hit the opponent with 4 Nut Krackers [Away][Down][FK] during the match
· Final hit must come from Nut Kracker [Away][Down][FK]

· Only in Hollywood Variation
· Cassie must hit the opponent with at least 6 Nut Krackers [Away][Down][FK] during the match
· Final hit must come from Nut Buster [Away][Down][FK][+][R2]

· Only in Brawler Variation
· Final hit must come from a 3 hit kombo that ends with the Take Down [Away][Towards][FK]

· Only in Spec Ops Variation
· Cassie must perform 5 American Ways [Down][Away][FP] during the match
· Must be Jump Distance away from the opponent.
· Final hit must come from Target Paint [Down][Down][FP][+][R2]

· Available in all Variations
· Cassie must have over 50% health remaining
· Must be Jump Distance away from the opponent
· Final hit must come from Single Shot [Away][Towards][FP]

· Available in all Variations
· Cassie must not lose a round
· Hold [Up] before the third hit of Kick Abuse
· Final hit must come from Kick Abuse [TowardsDown][FP]

· Only in Blood God Variation
· Kotal must summon each of his Totems once
· Kotal must have Crystal Totem active [Down][Away][FP]
· There must be 30 seconds or less remaining
· Final hit must come from 2 Fist Uppercut [Down][+][BP]

· Only in War God Variation
· Final hit must come from a 3 hit kombo that ends with Saw Blade [Down][Towards][BP]

· Only in Sun God Variation
· Kotal must have level 3 of Sun God Choke or Moon God Choke
· Final hit must come from Sun God Choke [Down][Away][BP] or Moon God Choke [Down][Away][BP][+][R2]

· Available in all Variations
· Must be Sweep Distance away from the opponent
· Final hit must come from Sun Beam [Down][Towards][BK] or God Ray [Down][Towards][BK][+][R2]

· Available in all Variations
· Kotal must hit the opponent with 5 Sunstones [Down][Towards][FK] during the match
· Must be Jump Distance away from the opponent
· Final hit must come from a Sunstone [Down][Towards][FK]

· Available in all Variations
· Kotal's opponent must have over 50% health remaining
· Sacrifice YOURSELF with a Blood Offering [Towards][Down][Away][BK] to end the round
· Final hit must come from Blood Offering [Towards][Down][Away][BK]

· D'Vorah must stun her opponent with the Bug Bomb [Down][Towards][FP][+][R2]
· Must be Full Screen distance away from opponent
· Final hit must come from Infestation [Down][Away][FP][+][R2]

· Only in Venomous Variation
· D'Vorah must hit with all 6 hits of Bug Spray [Down][Towards][FP][+][R2]
· Final hit must come from Bug Spray [Down][Towards][FP][+][R2]

· Available in all Variations

· Final hit must come from the Backward Air Throw (Air) [Down][L1][,][Away]

· Available in all Variations
· D'Vorah must have over 50% health remaining
· Player must hold [Towards] during the final hit
· Final hit must come from Ovipositor Charge [Down][Away][BK]

· Only in Unbreakable Variation

· Only in Grandmaster Variation
· Create Klone [Down][Away][BP] or Ice Statue [Down][Away][BP][+][R2]
· Explode Klone with Ice Burst [Down][Away][FP] or Frost Bomb [Down][Away][FP][+][R2]
· Player must hold [Away] during final hit
· Final hit must come from exploding the Ice Klone

· Available in all Variations
· Sub-Zero must freeze opponent and perform Rising Fist [Down][BP] or Upward Sword [Down][BP] to the frozen opponent for the final hit
· Final hit must come from Rising Fist [Down][BP] or Upward Sword [Down][BP]

· Available in all Variations
· There must be more than 40 seconds remaining
· Must be Full Screen distance away from opponent
· Opponent must be frozen and final hit must come from an Ice Blast [Down][Towards][BP][+][R2]
